errors.unknown: Please contact tech support, we will help you

commission.free: At the current request, the operator's reward will not be charged if you are declared the winner of the request
commission.agreement: Participation in the request is free, without deposits and blocking of funds! The Service Operator charges a commission only from the companies announced as winners. The invoice for payment of the commission is sent to the post office after summing up the results of the request. The amount and procedure for payment of the Service Operator Commission are determined in accordance with the User Agreement and the given tariff:
commission.vat:
In the case of a Request for a price per unit of goods (works, services) without specifying the requested volume of a consignment of goods (works, services), the winner is charged a Commission of the Service operator in the amount of 7894,00 rub.

If the volume of goods (works, services) specified in the formalized settings of the Request differs from the volume of goods (works, services) specified in the description of the Request and (or) accompanying documents to the Request, the Service operator's commission is calculated based on the planned volume of goods (works , services) specified by the Customer in the description of the Request and (or) accompanying documents to the Request.

alternative_proposals.label: Number of alternative bids
alternative_proposals.tooltip: Indicate how many alternative bids the participant can submit
alternative_proposals.error: Please enter a number between 0 and 10
alternative_proposals.count: Possible number of bids in addition to the main one: {{ value }}
alternative_proposals.none: Submission of alternative bids is prohibited.

expected_price.label: Expected price
expected_price.tooltip: Expected bid price level of the participant

errors.best_price_unavailable:
Value "best offer" is available if:
 • Bid quantity = Full satisfaction
 • What participants can view = Competitors' offers
 • Price change rule = Reduction or Auction
errors.step_over_start_price: The change step exceeds the maximum price

currency.label: Bidding currency
currency.permissions_multicurrency: Allow suppliers to quote prices in other currencies
currency.description: The list of currencies can only be changed at the draft stage
currency.change_primary_currency: The base currency has been updated. Change the rates of additional currencies

allow_dialog.title: Remove permission
allow_dialog.text: This will remove the added currencies

tooltips.1: Request is available for viewing and participation only to invited suppliers
tooltips.editable: Opened - the participants are not limited. Closed - available for viewing and participation only to invited suppliers

tariff.label: Tariff
tariff.description: The tariff can only be changed at the draft stage
tariff.tooltip: Specify the tariff for the request. This will determine how much the suppliers' commission will be

free.title: Private requests for your company are free of charge
free.description: No fee will be charged to the winner of the request

expired.description: The current tariff is no active valid on the site

owner_visibility.label: Requester at the bid acceptance window

prolongation.label: Auto extension of bids submission
prolongation.tooltip: This is applied when participants submit a bid before the close of the bid extension window. This window is open for up to 99 minutes.

approximate_deadline_for_summing_up.label: Final closing of bids submission
approximate_deadline_for_summing_up.description: days after the last accepted bid
approximate_deadline_for_summing_up.tooltip: Bidders will await a decision by the tender committee within the specified time period

popover.title: Request for verified vendors
popover.text: Suppliers with verified legal registration may submit proposals
popover.helper: The site specialists check the suppliers and mark them with a special icon

positions_enabled.sub_title: Price, quantity and description of goods and services. The resulting specifications are conveniently compared in Bidzaar.
positions_enabled.title: Goods and services

questionnaire_enabled.sub_title: Questionnaire with questions for the supplier. The resulting profiles are conveniently compared in Bidzaar.
questionnaire_enabled.title: Participant questionnaire

settings.sub_title: We have customized the request in such a way that you can choose the most favorable bid.
settings.title: Request settings

request.stub:
Information is available only to company employees.
Log in or register your company for free on the site.

dialog.info_text: Describe your need with tags. Press enter to add tag

tags.empty_placeholder: Describe the subject of your request with keywords
tags.label: Tags
tags.label_tooltip: Describe your need with tags. By tags, suppliers will be able to find an open request or receive an invitation to it by subscription

change_role_dialog.text: Viewer and Auditor have limited rights. Only the other owner of the request can set owner status.
change_role_dialog.title: Role changing

errors.last_owner: It should be at least one owner

team.sub_title: Add team members and assign their roles
team.title: Team

missing_owner.title: Team has no owner
missing_owner.text: Contact the Department Manager to assign a request to the owner

unauthorized.text: Register or login to see all the information about the request

dillegence.success: Request has been sent. Reports will be updated shortly

tooltip.unreceived: The report was not received. The service was unavailable. Refresh the reports in the "Conclusion" tab
tooltip.unavailable: Report is available only for verified suppliers

title.kontur: Data provided by the Kontur.Focus service

text.kontur: The Kontur.Focus assesses the risks of a supplier based on various parameters. You can find more details on the service website

snacks.acceptanceEndDateChanged: End of the bidding round is changed
snacks.there_draft: Finish editing and update the proposal
snacks.proposal_submitted: Participant has submitted a proposal, given in Update Comparison
snacks.proposal_update: Participant updated the offer, update comparison data

owner.title: Owner
owner.preference: The organizer gives preference to trusted suppliers.
